steps.description: Bag depth 600mm > housing 550mm → dimension conflict → suggest 750mm
steps.query: Industrial dust extraction system. 3400 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDB with housing length 550mm. Bag filter depth is 600mm.
steps.response_text: i understand you need a gdb filter housing for an industrial dust extraction system with a flow rate of 3400 m³/h and dimensions of 600x600mm. the specified filter depth of 600mm exceeds the maximum allowable depth of 450mm for the gdb-600x600-550 housing.  therefore, this configuration is not feasible. please contact our custom engineering or technical support team with these specific technical requirements.
